remarks: Properties of a pair of functions to be a cycle (in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Oct-2017.)
statement: iscycl $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( F e. W /\ P e. Z ) ) -> ( F ( V Cycles E ) P <-> ( F ( V Paths E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) ) ) $.
